relproducts.title: Phoenix Burgundy (Moisture Resistant)
relproducts.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition: 25% fibreglass / 75% pvc louvre width: 89mm & 127mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

relproducts.title: Splash Vine Green Panel Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant splash vine green panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush green panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

relproducts.title: Splash Turquoise Blue Panel Blind
relproducts.description: Splash turquoise blue panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The mid blue, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

relproducts.title: Splash Snow White Panel Blind
relproducts.description: Splash snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Splash snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens or high traffic areas. Panel blinds are their best choice for big windows and their go-to recommendation for french windows and patio doors. Product id: db-pan0263 fabric colour: snow material: 100% polyester headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash snow white panel blind in white.
